description: Every suffix prime and no 0 digits in base 7 (written in base 7).
maple: a:=[[2], [3], [5]]: b:=[]: l1:=1: l2:=3: do for k from 1 to 6 do for j from l1 to l2 do d:=[op(a[j]),k]: if(isprime(op(convert(d, base, 7, 7^nops(d)))))then a:=[op(a), d]: fi: od: od: l1:=l2+1: l2:=nops(a): if(l1>l2)then break: fi: od: seq(op(convert(a[j], base, 10, 10^nops(a[j]))), j=1..nops(a)); # Nathaniel Johnston, Jun 21 2011
author: _David W. Wilson_
